Methods¶

convert32bit¶

outback_types.convert32bit(register)[source]¶

Convert bits to ‘0x00000000’ 32-bit notation

Parameters:register – Bit to convert.

convertFloat¶

outback_types.convertFloat(register)[source]¶

Convert bits to single decimal float. I.E ‘23.2’

convertFloat2¶

outback_types.convertFloat2(register)[source]¶

Convert bits to two decimal float. I.E ‘23.23’

convertIP¶

outback_types.convertIP(register)[source]¶

Convert bits to ip address notation

convertString¶

outback_types.convertString(register)[source]¶

Convert bits to string

myfloat¶

outback_types.myfloat(value, prec=2)[source]¶

Round and return float

Parameters:
  • value – Value to convert to float
  • prec – Decimal places (default 2)

checkRegister¶

outback_types.checkRegister(register, register_type, register_valType, register_name)[source]¶

Checks the Register and Converts it to the proper format for output.

Parameters:
  • register – The Register returned from the device in bits
  • register_type – The type returned from the defs tables.
  • register_valType – The value type returned from the defs tables.
  • register_name – The name of the register returned from the defs tables.

longHex¶

outback_types.longHex(register)[source]¶

Convert bits to ‘0x00000000’ 32-bit notation

getRegisterDevType¶

outback_types.getRegisterDevType(register)[source]¶

Gets the device type of the register

Parameters:register – The register we are trying to find the type of

getOne¶

outback_types.getOne(logger, device, regname)[source]¶

getOne Method gets the value of a single register in the OutBack via the AXS Port Modbus interface returns the value in bits

Parameters:
  • logger – Passes the logger into the function as we don’t use a global logger
  • device – The device we are reading from
  • regname – The register name we are reading

getAll¶

outback_types.getAll(logger, devtype, port)[source]¶

getAll Method gets the values of a all the registers in the OutBack via the AXS Port Modbus interface and logs all the values to the logger. This is currently not used for any functional part of the program this will be used as a test scenario at some point.

Parameters:
  • logger – Passes the logger into the function as we don’t use a global logger
  • devtype – The device type that we are wanting to read all the registers for
  • port – The port we want to read from we can have multiples of the same devices, they will be on different ports in the configuration

setOne¶

outback_types.setOne(logger, device, regname, value)[source]¶

setOne Method sets the value of a single register in the OutBack via the AXS Port Modbus interface

Parameters:
  • logger – Passes the logger into the function as we don’t use a global logger
  • device – The device we are writing to
  • regname – The register name we are writing to
  • value – The value we are writing to the register

shortHex¶

outback_types.shortHex(register)[source]¶

Convert bits to ‘0x0000’ 16-bit notation

shortno0Hex¶

outback_types.shortno0Hex(register)[source]¶

Convert bits to ‘0000’ 16-bit notation no prefixed ‘0x’
